name: Vegan Spaghetti
description: These vegan spaghetti with chickpeas, artichokes, and olives make the perfect weeknight meal! The recipe couldn't be much easier, it's packed with flavor, and it requires minimal preparation.
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces  spaghetti ((regular, whole wheat, or brown rice spaghetti))
3/4 cup artichoke hearts in oil, roughly chopped
1/2 cup black olives, cut into rings

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: While the pasta is cooking, heat some oil in a large pan and sauté the chopped onion for about 3 minutes or until it becomes translucent. Then add the minced garlic and cook for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: While the pasta is cooking, heat some oil in a large pan and sauté the chopped onion for about 3 minutes or until it becomes translucent. Then add the minced garlic and cook for another minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced tomatoes and season with dried basil, oregano, salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Let it simmer for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the diced tomatoes and season with dried basil, oregano, salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Let it simmer for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meantime, drain and rinse the chickpeas and roughly chop the artichokes. Cut the olives into rings.
recipeInstructions.name: In the meantime, drain and rinse the chickpeas and roughly chop the artichokes. Cut the olives into rings.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chickpeas, artichokes, black olives, and capers to the sauce. Sprinkle with fresh oregano.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the chickpeas, artichokes, black olives, and capers to the sauce. Sprinkle with fresh oregano.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the cooked spaghetti and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir in the cooked spaghetti and serve immediately.
